name: Companion Vine
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You create a 10 foot cylindrical vine in a space within range, which rises up 10 feet off the ground. The vine is under your control. You can cause it to grow or shrink in length, move wherever you please, and perform precise movement in any direction with the vine. You can spend 2 AP to have the vine withdraw into the ground and reappear at a space within 10 feet of you.

The vine has AC 10 and 100 hit points. The spell ends immediately if the vine is reduced to 0 or fewer hit points, or if you cast this spell again.
